title: Dream Mesh Party
description: Combined AI 3d model generation in MR with multiplayer using Photon and spacial anchors
longDescription: Developing an interactive, collaborative mixed reality(MR) experience typically requires professional skills, even at the prototype stage. In this paper, we present DreamPortal, a mixed reality application integrated with generative AI pipelines that convert speech into virtual objects and support multiuser interaction. We also integrate a Large Language Model(LLM) to automate reasoning about the interaction functions within generated objects and physical scenes.

title: Superhot in OpenGL
description: Created my own character animation system in OpenGL
longDescription: Created my own version of the object loader which handles colored vertices. Used blender to fix a crappy internet model, and colored each vertex so I could tell what limb each vertex belonged to. Gathered points of rotation for each limb. Used my own vector math to align the mesh bodyparts with the bones I created from my motion capture CSV.

title: Network Systems
description: Created my own TCP from UDP, C based webserver, Proxy, and DFS
longDescription: These were the assignments I did in my network systems class. I created my own TCP from UDP using acknowledgement packets. Created a basic webserver that responds to get requests by sending back the requested file. Assignment 3 was a basic http proxy server, that would forward get requests to a server and cache the responses. Lastly I made a Distributed File Server (DFS) that would store sections of a file on multiple servers. Then when a user requested a certain file, all the chunks would be sent back so the user could put it back together.

title: Hololens Construction
description: Managed and Improved the AR Construction Project for the BAIC lab
longDescription: This was my main project at the BAIC lab. I was in charge of fixing the AR model for a study on the effectiveness of using AR as an alternative to blueprints. The paper for this project is currently under construction.
